name: Name
manualAddNewNote: Add file manually with the file extension inside {notebook}
manualPlaceholder: Full file name with the extension
deleteNotebook: Delete {item} and all of the notes inside. This action cannot be undone.
deleteNote: Delete {item}. This action cannot be undone.
shareNoteInstruction: Generate a sharable link. Note that they will only be able to view the note only.
github: Follow this project or report issues on github
searchAll: Start typing to search all notes and notebooks

errors.notebookPathTooLong: Notebook name is too long. The full path exceeds the maximum allowed length of {maxLength} characters.
errors.noteOrNotebookNotFound: Note or notebook does not exist
errors.nameExceedsLimit: Name exceeds maximum allowed length of 255 characters.
errors.pathExceedsLimit: Path exceeds maximum allowed length of {maxLength} characters.
errors.unableToSearch: Unable to search. Check console for details.
errors.shareNoteNotSpecified: Share note to be deleted is not specified.
errors.unexpectedDeleteCount: Expected to delete one share but deleted {count}.
errors.failedCreateShareLink: Could not create share link for the note due to a database error.
errors.failedDeleteShareLink: Could not delete share link for the note due to a database error.
errors.failedToFetchShared: Could not fetch shared notes due to a database error.
errors.missingFormData: Missing note data, unable to update note.
errors.noFileUploaded: No data associated with the uplaoded file, unable to update note.
errors.noResponseBody: No response body received from server
errors.streamLocked: Stream is already being read by another process

tips.title: Markdown tips
tips.subtitle: Nanote is a simple, powerful markdown editor. Here's how to get started on using markdown syntax

directives.title: Nanote Directives
directives.subtitle: Nanote extends markdown to allow for some quick actions

actions.file: Create an inline file picker allowing you to upload files
actions.fileBlock: Create an file block (a larger icon taking up the whole line) picker allowing you to upload files
actions.today: Will replace the directive with todays's date
actions.now: Will replace the directive with todays's date and time
actions.tomorrow: Will replace the directive with tomorrow's date
actions.yesterday: Will replace the directive with yesterday's date
actions.time: Will replace the directive with the current time

hideDateTime.help: Don't show date and time in the user interface when listing notes

standardISOTime.value: Use ISO standard date and time
standardISOTime.help: Dates as YYYY-MM-DD and time using 24 hour clock as Thh:mm:ss

spacePara.help: Automatically put some spacing between paragraphs

alwaysCodeView.value: Use code view for all files?
alwaysCodeView.help: Use a plain text editor view for all files including markdown files?

warnings.secretKey: Secret key should be changed from the default.
warnings.storageLocation: Storage location is not set, this could result in loss of notes.
warnings.uploadsLocation: Uploads location is not set, this could result in loss of uploads.
warnings.configPath: Config location is not set, this could result in loss of settings and shared notes.
